text:
WHO suspends trial of hydroxychloroquine as Covid-19 treatment over safety concerns
The World Health Organisation (WHO) has suspended the trials of hydroxychloroquine as COVID-19 treatment citing safety concerns. #chloroquine #covid19 #HCQ #hydroxychloroqu https://t.co/UOpdD0EBeW https://t.co/aOuTgNrj5c
